laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline score was 29; decreased to 18 after 2 weeks of light therapy and to 11 after 4 weeks.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Score decreased from 29 to 18 after 2 weeks, and from 18 to 11 after 4 weeks.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline score was 28; decreased to 16 after 10 days of light therapy and to 12 after 4 weeks.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Score decreased from 28 to 16 after 10 days, and from 16 to 12 after 4 weeks.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Reached a maximum of 200 ng/ml, about 20 times higher than therapeutic levels (normal is about 10 ng/ml).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum levels peaked at 200 ng/ml after ingestion of 800 mg of olanzapine.
